colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B GSANG BA SNYING TIG GI GDAMS PA YANG ZAB YE SHES 'KHOR LO ZHES BYA BA, THEG PA MCHOG GI RNAL 'BYOR PA KLONG CHEN RAB 'BYAMS KYIS GANGS RI THOD DKAR GYI MGUL AO RGYAN RDZOD ZHES BYA BA'I RI DOGS SU BKOD PA YONGS SU RDZOGS SO, ,DPAL SNGAGS KYI BDAG MOS SRUNGS SHIG ,DAM NYAMS LOG LTA CAN GYI LAG TU MA SHOR ZHIB, ,GE'O, ,DGE'O, ,DGE'O, ,
